item.title: O1-Pruner: Length-Harmonizing Fine-Tuning for O1-Like Reasoning Pruning
item.description: O1-Pruner efficiently prunes long-thought reasoning in LLMs by harmonizing reasoning length and accuracy via fine-tuning, significantly reducing inference time without sacrificing performance.
